page.title: 05Why I like Great Broughton
page.content:
Our area contains three villages surrounded by countryside. Fields and hedgerows are everywhere. In each village old buildings blend with newer ones. Farms which have been here for many years are still standing upright. There are Post Offices, shops, churches which hold regular services, and a few Public Houses in our area.
There is also a sports club where cricket and tennis are played.
Our area is really a quiet, pleasant and clean place with no pollution about. Most of the people who live here like it a lot.
